greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Integer quotient of the largest and the smallest prime factors of n, with a(1) = 1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: (PARI) A069897(n) = if(1==n,1, my(f = factor(n), lpf = f[1, 1], gpf = f[#f~, 1]); (gpf\lpf)); \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 07 2018
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 10 2002
ext: Term a(1) = 1 prepended by _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 07 2018
